original_text: And when they came up out of the water, the Spirit of the Lord carried Philip away, and the eunuch saw him no more, and went on his way rejoicing.
korean_text: 둘이 물에서 올라올새 주의 영이 빌립을 이끌어간지라 내시는 기쁘게 길을 가므로 그를 다시 보지 못하니라

sentences.original_text: And when they came up out of the water
the Spirit of the Lord carried Philip away
and the eunuch saw him no more
sentences.korean_translation: 내시가 더 이상 그를 보지 못하고

sentences.original_text: and went on his way rejoicing
